column4: hello there. I am trying to install GLX on my Dapper (ATI 9200 mobile; IBM T42 laptop). I am following the guide that is on the Ubuntuforum.org, but it does not work as described. Who is willing to help me?
i think i didn't have to do anything except change driver from xorg.conf from ati to fglrx
The forum tells me: "Start gconf-editor and go to "apps/compiz/general/all screens/options"", but there is no section "apps/compiz" in gconf
I always use the fglrx driver, but there is some other strange problem
